content: coaster trio canoe mtn designs materials ● cotton kings 8/8 100% cotton 82 yards / sizes ​ 75 meters 1 7 ounces / 50 grams 1 skein ● teal 5 across for 2 coasters ● mustard 6 5 across at the widest point ● other yarn options lily sugar n cream ● purple 5 25 square ​ bernat handicrafter cotton hobby lobby i love this cotton pattern key ● hook us g6 / 4 00 mm ● 2dctog = 2 double_crochet together ​ ● scissors ● 3dctog = 3 double_crochet together ● yarn needle ● altch2 = alternate chain 2 ● measuring tape ● chain = chain ● stitch marker optional ● double_crochet = double_crochet ● fsc = foundation single_crochet gauge ● half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet ● n/a ● m/c = magic_ring ● single_crochet = single_crochet into the space and pull through all the ● slip_stitch = slip_stitch remaining loops on your hook ● st = stitch ● 3dctog yarn over yo hook insert hook in ● sts = stitches ​ stitch st pull up a loop lp 3 lps on hook special stitches & techniques yo hook pull through 2 lps yo insert hook ● m/c https //tinyurl com/y9z6k3x8 in same st pull up a loop 4 lps on hook ​ ● 2dctog yarn over yo insert your hook ​ ​ yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on hook and yo again pull yarn through yo and yo insert hook in same st yo pull up a pull through first two loops on hook yo loop 5 loops on hook yo draw through 2 insert your hook again into the same space loops 4 loops left on hook yo draw through that you started the stitch in yo pull yarn all 4 loops left on the hook through yo pull through first two loops yo one last time without inserting your hook experience level ● easy notes ● * * - repeat instructions between the asterisk as many times as instructed ● you will join with a slip_stitch at the end of every round ● chain 1 & chain 2 do not count as sts at the beginning of the row ● the chain sps do not count as stitches coaster trio - canoe mtn designs - 1 instructions coaster #1 ​ round 1 make a m/c chain 1 8 single_crochet in the m/c join 8 sts ​ ​ round 2 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in the first st and each st around 16 sts ​ ​ round 3 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next st * 2 half_double_crochet in the next st 1 half_double_crochet in the next st * ​ around 24 sts turn ​ round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in the joining st from the previous round chain 3 skip 2 sts * single_crochet in the next st chain 3 ​ skip 2 sts * around 8 single_crochet sts turn ​ round 5 slip_stitch into the first chain space chain
